text: Is something going on with the built-in cross-client Litmus testing tool? I've run two tests now and both have come back as failures on all clients:
FYI, apparently it's a known issue and is being investigated now
I ran into that yesterday. ALSO I noticed that when testing Outlook 2019 a large email will show up as a blank in the screen. I installed windows and Outlook 2019 and it works flawlessly
From what I've been told the issue is now resolved
